I am writing to apply for the Software Engineer position within CACI’s Command, Control, Computing, and Intelligence (C3I) line of business. Previously, as a Software Engineer in a DevOps-focused role at Tech Innovations Inc., I developed and maintained cloud-based applications while embedding security best practices throughout the software lifecycle, reducing system vulnerabilities by 40%. Working in Agile teams, I collaborated closely with developers, operations, and security stakeholders to deliver RESTful services and distributed systems capable of operating reliably under demanding conditions. This experience strengthened my understanding of asynchronous and distributed programming paradigms and reinforced the importance of clear technical communication within cross-functional teams.

I hold a Master’s degree in Computer Engineering from MIT and have a strong foundation in software design principles, cloud-native architectures, and automation tooling. Andrew Morgan
